name: Pack man (MayTea Games)
description:
W A S D to move / press space to pick up or put down / hold space to wahs your hand or pack boxes or open boxes / E to win when you're ready you can zoom out in your browser to play I couldn't make the resolution smaller, sorry :( Story: you have a lot box company and you should deliver orders. but CORONA has come and you should wash you hand in the middle of the work or you'll DIE! :D if you have trouble on how to play, I uploaded a gameplay on youtube:

This game was made for jam in 1 day and 8 hours :D      I joined late LOL! 

I upload it before the second deadline but it had a build bug that made it unplayable so I fixed it and now you can play it :)
